fields.label: activation_email
fields.subject: Request for account at {{site.name}}
fields.text:
Someone, hopefully you, requested a new account at {{site.name}}
using this email address. If it was you, welcome to {{site.name}}.
Click the link below or copy and paste it into your web browser's address bar:
 
{{url}}

If you didn't request this, you don't need to do anything; you won't 
receive any more email from us, and the request will expire automatically.

The {{site.name}} team

Note that handshapes are described in terms of phonological features separately from signs; see this page: https://signbank.cls.ru.nl/signs/search_handshape/
